title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-08 DATED AUGUST 15, 2025, ENTITLED ” RESOLUTION APPROVING THE PROGRAMS, PROJECTS AND ACTIVITIES UNDER THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND OF MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENY OF LOS BANOS FOR CY 2026.”
